categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: Glow-in-the-Dark Starfighters - Sticker Activity Book

Star Wars: Glow-in-the-Dark Starfighters - Sticker Activity Book is an activity book that was released on December 1, 2017 as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi in Australia by an Egmont UK Ltd subsidiary, Hardie Grant Egmont.

Learn about your favourite ships from the Star Wars saga, while discovering some new ships from Star Wars: The Last Jedi in this sticker activity book. This book includes glow-in-the dark stickers for added fun.
